jobs.name: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Develop user-facing features using React.js and other modern JavaScript frameworks.
jobs.requirements: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript; experience with React.js; understanding of responsive design principles.

jobs.name: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Build scalable APIs and backend systems using Node.js and database technologies.
jobs.requirements: Strong knowledge of Node.js and Express.js; experience with database systems like MongoDB or MySQL; familiarity with RESTful API design.

jobs.name: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Work on both frontend and backend components of web applications using JavaScript technologies.
jobs.requirements: Proficiency in both frontend (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and backend (Node.js, Express.js); experience with frontend frameworks like React or Angular.

jobs.name: JavaScript Developer
jobs.description: Develop JavaScript applications for various platforms including web and mobile.
jobs.requirements: Solid understanding of JavaScript (ES6+); experience with frontend frameworks (e.g., React, Vue.js); familiarity with server-side JavaScript (Node.js).

jobs.name: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: Design intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces for web applications.
jobs.requirements: Strong portfolio showcasing UI/UX design skills; proficiency in design tools like Adobe XD, Sketch, or Figma; understanding of user-centered design principles.

jobs.name: Mobile App Developer
jobs.description: Develop cross-platform mobile applications using React Native or native iOS/Android frameworks.
jobs.requirements: Experience in mobile app development; proficiency in React Native, Swift, or Kotlin; familiarity with mobile UI/UX design principles.

jobs.name: Software Engineer
jobs.description: Design and implement software solutions using JavaScript and other programming languages.
jobs.requirements: Strong programming skills in JavaScript and/or other languages; experience with software design patterns and algorithms; familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).

jobs.name: Web Developer
jobs.description: Create and maintain web applications using frontend and backend technologies.
jobs.requirements: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript; experience with backend frameworks like Node.js or Django; understanding of web development principles.

jobs.name: Senior Frontend Engineer
jobs.description: Lead the development of frontend applications, mentor junior developers, and drive technical decisions.
jobs.requirements: Extensive experience with frontend technologies (e.g., React, Angular); leadership and mentoring skills; ability to architect scalable frontend solutions.

jobs.name: Senior Backend Engineer
jobs.description: Architect and develop scalable backend systems, optimize performance, and ensure system reliability.
jobs.requirements: Strong backend development experience with Node.js, Python, or Java; expertise in database design and optimization; experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure).

jobs.name: Junior Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Assist in developing frontend features, learn from senior developers, and contribute to team projects.
jobs.requirements: Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript; willingness to learn frontend frameworks (e.g., React, Vue.js); ability to work in a collaborative environment.

jobs.name: Junior Backend Developer
jobs.description: Assist in developing backend APIs and services, learn from experienced developers, and contribute to backend projects.
jobs.requirements: Basic understanding of backend technologies (e.g., Node.js, Express); familiarity with databases (e.g., MongoDB, MySQL); eagerness to learn and grow as a backend developer.

jobs.name: Frontend Team Lead
jobs.description: Manage a team of frontend developers, oversee project timelines, and ensure quality code delivery.
jobs.requirements: Experience leading frontend development teams; strong technical skills in frontend technologies; excellent communication and project management skills.

jobs.name: Backend Team Lead
jobs.description: Lead backend development efforts, coordinate with frontend teams, and drive architectural decisions.
jobs.requirements: Proven experience as a backend team lead or senior developer; deep understanding of backend technologies and scalability; ability to mentor and guide team members.

jobs.name: JavaScript Consultant
jobs.description: Provide expert guidance and consulting services on JavaScript best practices and application architecture.
jobs.requirements: Extensive experience with JavaScript and related frameworks; consulting or advisory experience; ability to analyze and optimize existing codebases.

jobs.name: React.js Developer
jobs.description: Specialize in developing web applications using React.js, implement reusable components, and optimize frontend performance.
jobs.requirements: Strong proficiency in React.js; experience with state management libraries (e.g., Redux); familiarity with modern frontend build pipelines and tools.

jobs.name: Angular Developer
jobs.description: Develop scalable web applications using Angular, implement features, and ensure high performance and responsiveness.
jobs.requirements: Proficiency in Angular (version 2+); understanding of TypeScript; experience with Angular CLI and RxJS; knowledge of state management patterns.

jobs.name: Vue.js Developer
jobs.description: Build interactive user interfaces using Vue.js, integrate with backend services, and optimize application performance.
jobs.requirements: Solid experience with Vue.js and its ecosystem; proficiency in Vuex for state management; familiarity with Vue Router and Vue CLI.

jobs.name: Node.js Developer
jobs.description: Develop server-side applications using Node.js, build APIs, and integrate with databases and other services.
jobs.requirements: Strong proficiency in Node.js; knowledge of Node.js frameworks (e.g., Express); experience with asynchronous programming and RESTful APIs.

jobs.name: Senior JavaScript Developer
jobs.description: Lead JavaScript development efforts, architect scalable solutions, and mentor junior developers.
jobs.requirements: Extensive experience with JavaScript (ES6+); proficiency in frontend and/or backend development; leadership skills and ability to drive technical decisions.

jobs.name: Full Stack JavaScript Developer
jobs.description: Develop end-to-end JavaScript applications, from frontend interfaces to backend services and databases.
jobs.requirements: Proficiency in both frontend (React, Angular, Vue.js) and backend (Node.js, Express); experience with databases (SQL and/or NoSQL); familiarity with cloud services.

jobs.name: Junior Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Work on frontend and backend development tasks, learn from senior developers, and contribute to full stack projects.
jobs.requirements: Basic understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Node.js; willingness to learn frontend frameworks and backend technologies; ability to work in a team environment.

jobs.name: Senior UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: Lead UI/UX design efforts, create user-centered designs, and collaborate with development teams to implement design solutions.
jobs.requirements: Proven experience as a UI/UX designer; strong portfolio showcasing design projects; proficiency in design tools and prototyping software.

jobs.name: Mobile App UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: Design intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces for mobile applications, ensuring a seamless user experience.
jobs.requirements: Experience in mobile app UI/UX design; proficiency in design tools like Adobe XD, Sketch, or Figma; understanding of mobile design patterns and guidelines.

jobs.name: Senior Mobile App Developer
jobs.description: Architect and develop mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms, optimize performance, and ensure code quality.
jobs.requirements: Extensive experience in mobile app development; proficiency in Swift, Kotlin, or React Native; familiarity with mobile UI design principles and patterns.

jobs.name: Junior Mobile App Developer
jobs.description: Assist in developing mobile applications, learn from experienced developers, and contribute to mobile app projects.
jobs.requirements: Basic understanding of mobile app development; familiarity with iOS and/or Android platforms; eagerness to learn mobile technologies and frameworks.

jobs.name: Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET)
jobs.description: Design and implement automated testing solutions for JavaScript applications, ensuring high software quality and reliability.
jobs.requirements: Strong programming skills in JavaScript; experience with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Mocha); proficiency in test automation and CI/CD pipelines.

jobs.name: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Automate and streamline operations and processes, build and maintain tools for deployment, monitoring, and operations.
jobs.requirements: Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP); proficiency in CI/CD pipelines; strong scripting skills (e.g., Bash, Python); knowledge of containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).

jobs.name: Technical Support Engineer
jobs.description: Provide technical support and troubleshooting assistance to customers and internal teams.
jobs.requirements: Strong problem-solving skills; excellent communication skills; ability to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues.

jobs.name: Marketing Specialist
jobs.description: Develop and execute marketing campaigns, analyze market trends, and drive brand awareness.
jobs.requirements: Experience in digital marketing; proficiency in SEO, SEM, and social media marketing; analytical skills and ability to interpret marketing metrics.

jobs.name: Sales Manager
jobs.description: Lead sales teams, develop sales strategies, and manage client relationships to achieve revenue goals.
jobs.requirements: Proven experience in sales management; strong leadership and negotiation skills; ability to analyze sales data and trends.

jobs.name: HR Manager
jobs.description: Manage human resources operations, including recruitment, employee relations, and performance management.
jobs.requirements: Experience in HR management; knowledge of employment laws and regulations; excellent interpersonal and communication skills.

jobs.name: Financial Analyst
jobs.description: Conduct financial analysis, prepare reports, and provide insights to support business decisions.
jobs.requirements: Strong analytical skills; proficiency in financial modeling and forecasting; knowledge of accounting principles and financial regulations.

jobs.name: Graphic Designer
jobs.description: Create visual concepts and designs for various projects, including digital and print media.
jobs.requirements: Proficiency in design software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite); creativity and artistic skills; attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines.
